DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate long-term safety bimatoprost 0.01 % ophthalmic solution compare bimatoprost 0.03 % ophthalmic solution patient glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety Bimatoprost Ophthalmic Solution Patients With Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Ocular hypertension glaucoma eye Requires intraocular pressure ( IOP ) lower therapy eye Best correct visual acuity 20/100 good eye Ocular seasonal allergy within 2 year Required chronic use ocular medication study ( intermittent use artificial tear allow ) Ocular surgery laser within 3 month Anticipated wear contact lens study
